wikipedia_page.main: Marc Clark (20 October 1923 – 12 September 2021) was a British-born Australian academic, sculptor and printmaker.Clark's sculptures can be found in parks in Melbourne, Sydney and Canberra in Australia and in Tonga.

response: * A bust of Mueller by Marc Clark is located outside the National Herbarium of Victoria.
* Marc Clark (born 1923): sculptor and print maker
